page.title: 05A CHILD'S DAY - BRAYTON
page.content: Saturday is my favourite day, & for me that starts at about 6:30am, when I read in bed until breakfast time. Breakfast is usually cereal, & a cup of coffee & a grapefruit - if I'm lucky. After breakfast I usually pick up my guitar and bang out a few chords on that, which annoys my mum immensely as she prefers{"Greensleeves"}to {"Status Quo"!}If I'm not going to town or the library, the{Saturday Picture {Show}forces me into my untidy bedroom where I write music. This brings me up to lunch time. After lunch I get my rabbit out of her hutch, & she takes me for a run round the garden. After this I am usually tired so I sit in the lounge & play my guitar up to tea time, when I have toast. Subsequently I read until bedtime. {Mark Currey
